page.title: 13RELIGION IN THIS AREA(CONT)
page.content: at present average about 12 per year. In 1984 there were four marriages in the Church and 12 baptisms. In the 1980's Parish Churches have found that the old endowments are no longer sufficient to maintain the expenses of the Church and Incumbent and various fund-raising activities have to take place. The number of full time clergy is in decline and many Parishes in the future may have to combine. Witton Park and Escomb are joined and others may have to in the future. The Parish boundaries do not coincide exactly with Local Authority boundaries. Parochial boundaries date back a long way and were designed to ensure that each person was part of a Community that cared for each person from the cradle to the grave. The State has taken over these functions.
